snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey will appear with other potential Republican presidential candidates next month, a year after he was denied a speaking slot at the same conference.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie will appear with other potential Republican presidential candidates at Conservative Political Action Conference, or CPAC, scheduled in Washington, DC, in March; appearance comes year after he was denied speaking slot at the same conference.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey will appear with other potential Republican presidential candidates next month, a year after he was denied a speaking slot at the same conference.

headline.main: Christie Will Speak at CPAC, Which Snubbed Him Last Year
headline.print_headline: Christie to Speak at Conservative Event
